About Me.first: I am from Bharuch, India. I am 21 years old innovative and deadline-driven developer. I love to design innovative ideas that come into my mind and try to implement extra skills in the that to improve technical as well as non-technical skills. I have experience in web designing and development, android application development and graphic designing.
About Me.second: I am a very curious, focused, confident and determined person. I am a quick learner with an always ready to learn attitude. I can also work under pressure. These are my strengths. I am an introvert to unknown people. Therefore the communication with unknown people is hard for me. These are my weaknesses.

Projects.title: Khushi Estate
Projects.description: It is a website made for real estate agency to showcase the details regarding properties and its avaibilities. The work has been done on the webiste to learn ablut Bootstrape and AngularJs. It is part of our submission work we were supposed to do in semester 4th of BCA.
